code:
graph TD 

    style tx3 fill:#844
    style µpay fill:#626
    style User0 fill:#444
    style User1 fill:#444
    style User2 fill:#444
    style Service0 fill:#559
    style Service1 fill:#559
    style Service2 fill:#559
    style Service3 fill:#559

    subgraph service smart contract
    %% µpay - services debit the user account for usage
    µpay(HealthTech_PatientRecords)
    User0(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) -.->|dt = -0.1| µpay
    Service0(HealthTech_PatientRecords) -.->|dt = +0.1| µpay
    µpay -.-> User1(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
    µpay -.-> Service1(HealthTech_PatientRecords)
    end

    subgraph withdrawal
    tx3(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
    User1(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) -.-> tx3
    Service1(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) -.-> tx3
    tx3 -.-> User2(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    tx3 -.-> Service2(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
    tx3 -.->|withdrawal| Service3(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
